sentences.english: The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4cm.

sentences.english: Effective measure solving the problem on decrease of rope is to use the steel wire rope with metal core.

sentences.english: Uses small-diameter wheels, a short wheelbase, and steering mechanism.

sentences.english: The entire image width covers about one-half a degree, about the same angular width as the full moon.

sentences.english: At Futang hydropower station, the cylinder restricted surge tank is 31.

sentences.english: This gold-plated copper commemorative medallion has a diameter of 50mm.

sentences.english: In ultrasonic nondestructive inspection of large-diameter pipes, longitudinal cracks can be detected more efficiently by using guided circumferential waves.

sentences.english: Also inform us what is the maximum size of screws you can make in terms of length and dia .

sentences.english: Optical resolution is expressed as a ratio of the distance to the resolution spot divided by the diameter of the spot.
sentences.chinese: 光分辨率是以距离到镭射点直径的比例关系来描述的。

sentences.english: Using vernier calipers , measure the slip ring diameter.
sentences.chinese: 用卡尺，测量滑环的直径。
